paragraph-1.em: BEST, Board of European Students of Technology
paragraph-1.text: is a constantly growing non-profit and non-political organisation.

paragraph-2.text: BEST helps students to achieve an international mindset, to reach a better understanding of cultures and societies and to develop the capacity to work in culturally diverse environments.

paragraph-3.text: People understand and respect different cultures and societies. The environment of empowered diversity supports people in applying their full potential and acting responsibly.

3.heading: Topic: Music Production

3.paragraph-2: Now, in a new format, BEST Local Course invites students from technical universities of Ukraine to join an educational course in the marvelous city of Lviv. Here you will be able to master necessary knowledge and skills to create music.

feedback-1.text: First of all, the course in Lviv was a real cultural discovery. I had travelled in a few slavic countries before but Ukraine was the best experience: we were always in the university vibe, staying in the dorms, going to the special student places, I felt like a part of it all! I chose LBG Lviv in the first place, because it had a good reputation from both spanish and belgian people. They told me it was a great LBG to hang out with, plus the city was beautiful.
